verses.english: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
verses.hausa: Da sunan Allah, Mai rahama, Mai jinƙai.

verses.english: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, Lord of the worlds -
verses.hausa: Godiya ta tabbata ga Allah, Ubangijin halittu;

verses.english: The Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful,
Sovereign of the Day of Recompense.
It is You we worship and You we ask for help.
verses.hausa: Kai muke bauta wa, kuma Kai muke neman taimakonKa.

verses.english: Guide us to the straight path -
verses.hausa: Ka shiryar da mu ga hanya madaidaiciya.

verses.arabic: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ ٱلْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.english: The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have evoked [Your] anger or of those who are astray.
verses.hausa: Hanyar waɗanda Ka yi wa ni'ima, ba waɗanda aka yi wa fushi ba, kuma ba ɓatattu ba.
